actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964 to prohibit, after January 1, 1975, an increase in the amounts required to be paid by households under regulations in effect on January 1, 1975.

summary.text: Prohibits, after January 1, 1975, an increase in the amount paid by households for allotments of food stamps, under regulations in effect on January 1, 1975, pursuant to the Food Stamp Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964 to prohibit, after January 1, 1975, an increase in the amounts required to be paid by households under regulations in effect on January 1, 1975.
